page.name: Introduce learners to The Moth podcast
page.content:
Introduce your adult learners to the The Moth podcast. 

To practice oral communication, have learners find and listen to a story from The Moth that interests them.  After listening to the story, have them form pairs and summarize the story verbally to one another. 

Afterward, introduce the concept of having oral story telling. Consider having learners craft their own story. It could focus on a single life event, their journey with literacy, education, their families, etc. The goal is to have learners express their story through the spoken word in a way that feels authentic and inspiring to them. 


“The Moth is a nonprofit organization that celebrates the commonality and diversity of human experience through the art and craft of true, personal storytelling.” – The Moth website
